title: [QUESTION] Got "MT5214 Native linking failed undefined symbol" Error when using SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz
body:
I'm using SkiaSharp on a cross-platform(ios/android) project.
After add the newest nuget pkg of SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz(2.80.2) with HarfBuzzSharp(2.6.17), the iOS build fails with a lot of 
MTOUCH: error MT5214: Native linking failed, undefined symbol: _hb_feature_to_string.  .....

All the failed symbols begin with _hb and is from HarfBuzzSharp.HarfBuzzApi

I tried to downgrade pkg's version to 1.68.0(SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz)/1.4.6.2(HarfBuzzSharp), then it can build successfully.

Is this a bug or there's something wrong in my project setting?

SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz pkg is used by a multiplatform library, and the library is referenced by the ios app project.

Environment:
Visual Studio for Mac ver8.8.3(build 16)
Mono 6.12.0.107
Xamarin.iOS 14.6.0.15
